content: Ok, we had planned on putting some automation together for a followup post, comment on main post, regarding automation implemented. Is that still feasible and what is the goal? I think overall, I'd like to automate all aspects of the job search process including outreach, posts, resumes/coverletters, interviews (using a video AI agent of myself), offer consideration/negotiation, with AI determined acceptance based on data and whether or not it makes sense to accept or pursue monetization of AI processes built, Chewy, other social media, etc.
